title: BRAND NEW LARGE 2 BD APT: W&D, stainless appliances, PETS+
posting_body: Move in August and get 2 weeks free!
In home washer and dryer for convenience
Modern kitchens with open space plans
Planned common spaces and complimentary community activities (complimentary wifi, beer nights, etc.) coming soon!
Centrally located in the tech hub of the Bay Area, especially close to Cisco, Tesla, HPE, Microsoft, Samsung, and many other tech companies
Conveniently close to Milpitas BART station
City of Milpitas was voted #29 in best places to live in the U.S. by Money Magazine
Easy access to major freeways like the 680, 880 and 237 so you're close to work and the things that matter most in your life
